1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Basic operators.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Basic
6 ( -- * Basic
7   elem, any, eq, to, list,
8   span, equal,
9   inter, begin, end,
10   succ, fail, what,
11   change,
12 ) where
13
14import qualified Prelude as P
15import           Prelude hiding ( elem, any, span, succ, fail )
16
17import qualified Data.List                       as L
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Fn     as O
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Expr    as S
20
21-- | Element match.
22elem :: O.Name -> (a -> Bool) -> S.Expr a
23elem n f = S.EBase $ S.EElem $ O.Fn n f
24
25-- | Match any element.
26any :: S.Expr a
27any = elem "any" $ const True
28
29-- | Match exactly the given element.
30eq :: (Eq a) => a -> S.Expr a
31eq x = elem "eq" (== x)
32
33-- | Match element range.
34to :: (Ord a) => a -> a -> S.Expr a
35to low up = elem "to" f where
36    f x = x >= low && x <= up
37
38-- | Match element in the given list.
39list :: (Eq a) => [a] -> S.Expr a
40list xs = elem "list" (`P.elem` xs)
41
42-- | Spanning match.
43span :: O.Name -> ([a] -> Maybe ([a], [a])) -> S.Expr a
44span n f = S.EBase $ S.ESpan $ O.Fn n f
45
46-- | Match exactly the given sequence.
47equal :: (Eq a) => [a] -> S.Expr a
48equal w = span "equal" f where
49    f s = do s' <- L.stripPrefix w s
50             Just (reverse w, s')
51
52-- | Inter-element match.
53inter :: O.Name -> (Maybe a -> Maybe a -> Bool) -> S.Expr a
54inter n f = S.EBase $ S.EInter $ O.Fn2 n f
55
56-- | Match at the beginning of sequence.
57begin :: S.Expr a
58begin = inter "begin" f where
59    f Nothing _  = True
60    f _ _        = False
61
62-- | Match at the end of sequence.
63end :: S.Expr a
64end = inter "end" f where
65    f _ Nothing  = True
66    f _ _        = False
67
68-- | Match immediately.
69succ :: S.Expr a
70succ = always True
71
72-- | Unmatch immediately.
73fail :: S.Expr a
74fail = always False
75
76always :: Bool -> S.Expr a
77always = S.EBase . S.EAlways
78
79-- | Context-dependent match.
80what :: S.Expr a
81what = S.EBase S.EWhat
82
83-- | Change to other matcher.
84change :: O.Name -> S.Expr a
85change n = S.EBase $ S.EChange n
86
